text:
Hi,
We'd like to capture actions taken by a user inside our SaaS application against the respective HubSpot contact in an activity timeline fashion.
But from what I could gather from <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/timeline|this> article, it says we need to create and "_Publish_" an app on the HubSpot app market place in order to do that (???)

Wouldn't publishing this app make it available for general audience in the HubSpot app marketplace? What am I getting wrong? Can someone please help out with this.
Thanks in advance :raised_hands:
Is it possible to remove an existing accountId for a HubSpot user via CRM Accoutning Extension API without the need to uninstall the HubSpot app that atttached that accountId?
